Web Service Endpoint# Replace All Compatible Versions for a Game Center Enabled Version

App Store Connect API 1.2–3.0DeprecatedDeprecated

This endpoint is deprecated.

## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/PATCH-v1-gameCenterEnabledVersions-_id_-relationships-compatibleVersions#url)



```
PATCH https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/gameCenterEnabledVersions/{id}/relationships/compatibleVersions
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/PATCH-v1-gameCenterEnabledVersions-_id_-relationships-compatibleVersions#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required)
